## Properties

| Property     | Attribute    | Description                         | Type      | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------ | ----------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `color`      | `color`      | List item color                     | `string`  | `"#eeeeee"` |
| `deletable`  | `deletable`  | Set whether element can be deleted  | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `disabled`   | `disabled`   | Declare if element is disabled      | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `selectable` | `selectable` | Set whether element can be selected | `boolean` | `false`     |
